value.initial_message:
I want to apply for a personal loan. Here are my details:
    
    Name: John Doe
    Age: 35
    Monthly Income: ₹80,000
    Employment: Software Engineer at TechCorp (5 years)
    Credit Score: 750
    Loan Amount Required: ₹5,00,000
    Purpose: Home renovation
    
    Please process my application and provide the sanction letter if approved.
value.greeting_sent: Hi there! Thanks for visiting us today. I'm here to make your loan application process as smooth and quick as possible. I see you're interested in a personal loan. I'll be happy to help you find the best option for your needs.
